website_summaries.verdict: Hoka markets the Bondi 5 as its most cushioned runner, which is quite a feat in itself as the Hoka brand is known for its oversized cushioning. The latest version of this ultra-cushioned trainer has decent arch support, more room in the forefoot, excellent ventilation, and the added benefits of an extra wide option. While some loyal fans of the Bondi are hotly divided regarding the shoe’s performance, Hoka offered upgrades that have been generally well-accepted and welcomed by runners.
pros: A majority of the reviewers felt comfortable while wearing the Hoka Bondi 5
The wide toe box should be a welcome change, particularly for those who have slightly wider feet
The extra widths available should be even better good news for those who require more room up front
Some runners noticed how light the shoe is despite the oversized cushioning
A handful of reviewers really liked the lightweight and breathable upper
Some of those who have had foot, back, or hip problems felt better when running in the Hoka One One Bondi 5
The traction is quite good for a road shoe that it can do adequately well on light trails, according to a few
A small number of runners mentioned their stable rides in this shoe
Several of those who are up on their feet most of the time during work valued the shoe’s cushioning
Outsole durability gets a boost with the addition of more rubber
cons: Some loyal fans of the Bondi did not like the stiffer midsole, which took away their pleasure during long distance runs
A good number of Hoka fans bemoaned that it still lacks the room in the toe box despite the added space in the latest version of the Bondi
A handful of runners observed that the meta-rocker technology felt dead in this shoe and removed the smooth transition through the gait cycle
The price of the Bondi 5 is quite expensive
A few runners had problems with the tongue as it caused rubbing or irritation

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes if the Sellers don’t over price them
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes but can be bought from the manufacturer for $150 with free shipping so don’t pay more, that would be ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Love HOKA
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hairstylist and HOKA is the best shoe for 12 hour shifts
customer_reviews.author: Betty G.

customer_reviews.title: Transition from a Full Boot with Fracture
customer_reviews.text: Needed for rehab after broken foot. Wonderful transition after months in a boot.
customer_reviews.author: RSE

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad feet. These shoes are awesome. Run true to size and have great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A.

customer_reviews.title: The most cushioned running shoe out there!
customer_reviews.text: I have benn running in Hoka One Ones for years. The Bondis are the most cushioned of their styles. This is my 6th pair and they are amamzing right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just right. I am a size 7 and ordered a size 7 and it is very comfortable. The shoe is cushioned for comfort. My podiatrist recommended this brand of shoe and even though they are pricey, I believe they will last me for a long while. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again...but not from amazon
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these shoes for a few weeks now. I bought them because I have the knees of a 90 year old when I run (I’m only 26). They definitely add cushion to absorb shock. But they were not a magical solution to my knees. They are super comfortable and I will continue to wear them but I saw them for less money on their actual website so I regret using amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Finn

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are the second pair I have boughten because they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were recommended by my podiatrist for the metarsal support. They are supposed to have a lot of cushioning, but I sure didn’t think they did. I wore them inside for several weeks trying to like them and get used to them, but I ended up sending them back. They were just never as comfortable as the ASICS I have always bought, so I went back to the tried and true.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I paid too much from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I paid $100 more for this product than I should have. The shoes are great, but I got ripped off from where I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from them!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t given back my full refund. Only half of what I paid . I tried them On and realized they were too tight and took them Off immediately . They hurt my feet. They said we are only giving you back partial due to the wear of them. Which is not true. I’ve asked for a full refund and they have ignored my emails.
customer_reviews.author: julia mendez

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my podiatrist
customer_reviews.text: These are great for those of us with foot injuries or genetic issues that cause dislocation of the metacarpal downwards. I have three pair now and they are super comfortable and my foot does not flex a whole lot so it decreases pain in my metacarpal joints. They feel much better new. I have a pair I wore for two years and they are worn out now as far as the sole but I use them on the boat now.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia DeMeester

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them and works well with her bunion!
customer_reviews.author: Plaincityman

customer_reviews.title: Superb support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love Hoka products but specifically hoka one one which is pronounced ownA ownA. These shoes save my feet, plantar fasciitis and metatarsal issues which normally had me crying after 25 years on hard floors as an RT doing 12 plus hour shifts. They are a perfect fit, perfect sizing and comfort beyond relief. : ) Width is true. I have several pair and although they are expensive ur livelihood and ur health are worth the price. UPDATE: Someone asked me how much these weigh but I lost the connection for the question. These shoes weigh 12.5 ounces each.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Not every shose fit me but this one very comfy, best for treadmill...that's the best for me!
customer_reviews.author: Fariba L.

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to foot and knee pain!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever if you have knee pain or plantar fasciitis. I had been through several different types of high end shoes and nothing seemed to work. I got a pair of these in my local store and for the 1st time in a very long time I was able to take long walks and even jog without foot or knee pain. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic??
customer_reviews.text: These were not in an original Hoka box, so I’m fearful they aren’t authentic!! Fakes?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try them-you will feel the difference .
customer_reviews.text: I am a RN- have bought every shoe there is to try for my feet... plantar fasciitis and heel spurs were the death of me. Since buying Hokas, I feel like I have new feet. I still have to replace them every 3 months- but they are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: rnlumbee

customer_reviews.title: Great heel and arch support for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from a number of foot problems including plantar fasciitis. This shoe offers wonderful heel and arch support. I use this pair for moderate hikes and leisure walks and I have found them to offer better support for my foot pain than other brands. This is my second pair of Hoka shoes and highly recommended them to anyone wanting relief from similar foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: Irene M. Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long periods on the feet.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors. I dislike that I paid so much for shoes that I expected to be comfortable, only to find out that they kill my arches and heels. I am a nurse and many other nurses swore these shoes were great. My Sketchers DeLite were much better and half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and arch support
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable walking shoe - wears well right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Firm Footing & Pain Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended this brand as there saving grace with plantar fasciitis- but I didn’t know which shoe. I found plush and stable mentioned on this shoe and it made me have hope. It has relieved half my pain while I seek medical solutions. Easy money to spend when you are in pain. A bit large in format but if that is what it takes I’m down. And it’s a quality shoe. You get what you pain for which is not always the case these days!
customer_reviews.author: EVA M FAILE

customer_reviews.title: Yes for Flat Feet - No Good For High Arch
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the performance of this sneaker as it didn't fit me well. I have a high arch and was looking for support as well as cushioning for my soles. These have great cushioning. I purchased based on recommendation by my Cousin who swears by them. Come to find out, she has a flat foot - as does a neighbor who had them on and swears by them.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Cake

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort and cushioning...but accent color is not rose gold.
customer_reviews.text: These do help back and feet for jogging, running, sprints. However, the color is more of a true light pink accent. It looks more modern like rose gold online. Wish I would have known that and stuck with all black! Sized down a 1/2. But very roomy in to box. Gives me small rub on pinky toes bc if this on hour long runs. Eventually I will build calluses.
customer_reviews.author: cmw

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist suggested these shoes because I'm on my feet all day and had issues with my heels and ankles. These are The Best shoes I have ever put on my feet! While the soles are higher than I usually wear, I now wear them everywhere, for everything because they are so comfortable! I used a third party seller through Amazon and was pleased with the price and delivery service. My size must be common because it's not always available and/or the price rises out of the range I can afford.
customer_reviews.author: cada

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, not too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I was shopping for these shoes. I work with a few people who told me how comfortable they are. They are right! I walk a lot at work and stand up a lot. I end up my day with way less pain than with any other shoes I have. I must add that I use compression stockings, so the combination really alleviate my leg pain
customer_reviews.author: Justashopper

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for plantar fascitis
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few shoes and they've all left me with a very sore heel at the end of the day. I got these today and decided to test them out by walking almost 2 miles with my kids. Not only did my legs not feel like lead, I felt like I could walk forever. I haven't had that feeling in a long time. And my heel doesn't hurt at all. I LOVE these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Have changed my outlook on walking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have single-handed improved my posture and changed my outlook on walking! I suffer from very flat feet but they Hokas have given my lower back a new lease on life. They are slightly bigger than I expected, but nothing a thick pair of socks can't get me through.
customer_reviews.author: Boston_Bulldogges

customer_reviews.title: Not enough arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I had read all reviews. For the price I was expecting really good arch support. Extremely disappointed. It has mediocre at best. I like the shoe but need to buy arch supports for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the material
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed in this shoe. I paid the same price I would have paid through HOKA website but this shoe has torn away from the sole on both sides and both shoes. I don't know if it was an old shoe and material was dry rotted but I have never bought anything from Amazon that didn't last any longer than 6 months. I think I'm done with HOKA shoes. I've bought several pairs of Asics from Amazon and I never had any problems with them. I consider this HOKA's problem not amazon
customer_reviews.author: sgates

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have heel spurs and plantar fasciitis. I Googled shoes for this. Hoka One came up and I read the reviews. They were good and the shoe comes with a 30 day return option. I did not get my hopes up because I will get shoes that feel fine until I try to work about 6 to 7 hours on my feet in them. Well, I put them on after a long work day and they felt amazing! They look good, fit great (I wear a 10) true to size and are very comfortable. After 2 days I wanted to buy a darker color for walking but they are all sold out in my size. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Cushion System.
customer_reviews.text: My orthopedist prescribed the Hokka Bondi running shoes after I had knee and ankle surgery. Due to their cushion system, the impact is minimal and very comfortable. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elenice Giusti

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased three pair of this shoe in the Bondi style. The shoe is comfortable and the rocker sole helps an area where I had a stress fracture. The first pair I purchased several months ago is still comfy and supportive, but the outside shows wear. I do think they are a bit expensive, but worth it if it keeps me going strong.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Green

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 pair of Hoka One One Bondi shoes. They are expensive but fortunately Amazon sellers occasionally sell them at lower prices. I have very fussy feet and these shoes are comfortable right out of the box, o breaking in needed. Lightweight. Supportive. Cushioned footbed like you wouldn't believe. I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L Stenfors

customer_reviews.title: Incredible support
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are what I was looking for;.I have terrible arthritis in my feet now, and am used to being active; but even with orthotics, it is hard to find an athletic shoe for exercise, even low impact; but with how thick the soles are of the Hoka; I can walk quite a lot..happy with these
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Rabin

customer_reviews.title: buy them
customer_reviews.text: there was a lot of hype leading up to delivery bc I read a lot of reviews & I thought they were pretty expensive. i put them on and seriously, the positive reviews do not capture how seriously awesome these are. cosy, not hot, comfy, not ugly, platform, but you can - and should! - run in them. i LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper on the Hoka website. Not a good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for being on your feet all day
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet at an airport and needed to find something that will make my feet not hurt by the end of my shift. These have been great. I like the extra sole cushion and the support is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Fabric wears poorly
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Hoka Bondi 6. Love the shoe but the cloth tops wears poorly. I planned to return my last pair as with a month the fabric split in the toe area of the shoe. I have worn the shoes so they were unreturnable. Them I had a similar issue with my first pair but after 6+ months but this time I had only worn the shoes a few weeks. I’ll not order online again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Stamey

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to risk paying such a high price without being able to try them on but this was a great purchase. I felt like I was walking on clouds and my knees didn’t bother me as much as they normally do. Great investment for my joints.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cottingim

customer_reviews.title: Miracle shoes
customer_reviews.text: Omg I was so desperate for a good walking shoe. I have issues with foot pain and with planters fasciitis flare ups but not when I wear these shoes. I have tried so many brands of shoes, tried shoe inserts even did foot exercises like rolling on a tennis ball, ice and foot massagers. These shoes are the best No lie you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: carey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for high impact exercise/running
customer_reviews.text: These runners were recommended to me by a trainer. I have never been able to run because I always got shin splints. I just completed a couch to 5k 7-week running programme and have run three 5k in one week! I am on my second pair of these shoes and they are amazing. I started using them for long walks. Have bought a third pair in case they go out of style!! I have tried other high end runners but they did not have enough impact cushion for me. These ones are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Run on a pillowy cloud of comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Hoka Bondi 6. They are like running on thick clouds-so comfortable! My favorite running shoe by far!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Bulky shoes, but good for walking.
customer_reviews.text: Big shoes, bulky. At first you need to get adjusted to them. Be patient. Best for hiking, walking... pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita L. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5 in other shoes. However, i wear a 9 in Hokas. I already have a pair that I bought from a shoe store. I needed a different color and found these on Amazon. They are so comfortable. I have little to no foot pain after a 12 hour shift. Also, they came a week early!
customer_reviews.author: jjbb2000

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for long runs
customer_reviews.text: These shoes make long runs much more cushioned. If you are looking to protect your hips, knees, feet and joints from the impact - these shoes offer just enough support to keep you running on clouds. My friend does 100 mile runs and recommended these To me...
customer_reviews.author: Billy C.

customer_reviews.title: The only shoes I wear
customer_reviews.text: Doc suggested these shoes. On my feet all day long and these do the trick. Love them. Wish they weren't so pricey!
customer_reviews.author: colleen j. trotter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe, just need to make WIDE!
customer_reviews.text: I need a 9 wide, moderate arch support. This show is an excellent shoe, well made, great materials and would be perfect for work. BUT I need a 9 Wide which it does not come in so I tried a 9.5 but unfortunately still not wide enough. Ugh! HELP! Next shoe....
customer_reviews.author: ThisOldTub

customer_reviews.title: these are worth the price
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a womans 9 but being use to top end Nikes these give a smidgen of room in the toe area. They are great and my feet are ever so thankful for the arch support and the padding with the ball of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable walking shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten 2 pair of these shoes. I have foot issues but not when I wear these shoes. It's easy to walk and stand in them. I wish Hoka would make these in a hiking boot!
customer_reviews.author: SueF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, fixed my knee pain! I put over 200 miles on my last pair. Love the color of these too!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Shes are comfortable and provide stabilization
customer_reviews.text: This is a great walking shoe for me while at work. I walk on industrial medical flooring. The harder that I walk the softer the shoe. It feels like a soft push back rather than pounding the pavement. My fedt dont hurt after 8+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: they are spongy but supportive
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing these after a total ankle replacement and my foot with a laceup brace fits in the shoe. The shoe is really too wide for my other foot so wear thicker socks on that foot and laceup tighter. I reccommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the look of the shoe. Didn't like the quality of the material. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and lightweigt
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Lightweight and they feel like you are walking on clouds
customer_reviews.author: Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how in the world you could run in these! I use them for walking. A lot of cushion but a built bulky. Will see how they hold up, hopefully a long time.
customer_reviews.author: anyone

customer_reviews.title: Shoes insole can be softer and fresher.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cushioning well but the insole can be more softer and fresher. My doctor recommended this brand because the plantar fasciitis. I was expecting much more better comfort for this high level shoes price.
customer_reviews.author: Pantaleon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot both for work and exercise and this is the most comfortable tennis shoes I’ve ever had. I also have plantar fasciitis so the cushioning certainly helps
customer_reviews.author: Sherese

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Running Shoe I've worn.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat purchaser. As long as there's a Bondi6 available, I'll keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Nwogu

customer_reviews.title: Hoka One One Women's Bondi 6 Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was able to slip the shoes on the first day and start wearing them immediately with no break in period. I have several feet issues and so it is imperative that my shoes be comfortable and supportive as I stand and walk most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Too much hype. Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes I have worn may be 4-5 times over 2 months now and each time I felt uncomfortable walking in these shoes. In my case, these shoes did not meet the hype. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gautham Varakantham

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid distance hiker led to some pretty servere plantar issues. I've been able to pick back up my long walks with these shoes, worth every penny and definitely fantastic if you need arch support and cushion. They feel like heaven the minute you put them on out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Terry McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are like walking in a cloud! I work 12 hr shifts and they are perfect in every sense: supportive, extremely comfortable and attractive designs... totally worth the cost! Highly recommend!5 star for sure:))
customer_reviews.author: DC:)

customer_reviews.title: Great shock absorbers
customer_reviews.text: Love Hokas. Great support. I sometimes switch to another brand of shoe, but always come back to Hokas. My knees thank me. I run about 4-5 days a week, 3-5 miles.
customer_reviews.author: frances lauper

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: They are ok but not what you would expect for such an expensive shoe. They provide good support for my back but the fit is not right. I returned the first pair because the left shoe was too tight on my toes, right shoe fit was fine. I ordered a second pair in wide and this time the right shoe hurts my heel, left shoe is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Retired-Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving these walking shoes. There was absolutely no ‘breaking in’ time. Great support on both sides which keeps my ankles positioned properly. Toes are roomy. They look great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Clarice Houston

customer_reviews.title: Overcharged
customer_reviews.text: This is the price tag you left on the shoe. You charged me 187??? I loved them but feel I was scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Simplicity

customer_reviews.title: Caused my knee to hurt worse than normal while wearing
customer_reviews.text: After walking around the store for about 45 min to an hour, my knee hurt worse than usual and it felt like I got shin splint and pain in my foot and ankle. This doesn't happen with my cheaper shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not the most attractive (at least the black ones aren't) but they are extremely comfortable. There is a lot of cushion and it has good support.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My wife walks a lot with her job and this shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I’ve ever found
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes... My feet Hurts so bad. I have psoriatic arthritis in the shoes are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Cushiony, stable shoe. Love the rocker bottom which keeps pressure off the mtp joint.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this shoe. I have hallux rigidus and this is the only running shoe that gives me the support and stability needed to run. Comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please have the seller give a customer a choice of widths!
customer_reviews.text: I really like your shoes. I have brought 2 pairs of Clifford. I was disappointed because I was given a wide shoe instead of medium!
customer_reviews.author: maryann hallisey

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, they are great for my feet that have many problems!
customer_reviews.author: B. POLITO

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and the look of this shoe! I'm a fan of solid color shoes and these are cute and work well for my feet that since I've got pain often in less cushioned shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again and HAVE bought again!  Love this workout shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like regular shoe size but like walking on a cloud. This is the 4th pair of Bondi6 HOKA shoes that i have bought - so - YES I DO like them. Great support too.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these shoes. I wear them for work. I am on my feet all day and they comfort and soothe my feet. Yes, I forgo look and longevity for COMFORT. You will too.
customer_reviews.author: sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with plantar fasciitis for many years. These are the first and only shoes I have bought that have "solved" my problem and have allowed me to walk extensively with no problems. These shoes are actually my 5th pair from the same maker including one pair of hiking boots. They are all great!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: They felt cheap made. I returned price was way overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, shoes that keep my legs, back and feet from hurting!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do exactly what I need them to do. Whenever I walk alot especially on concrete floors my lower back, legs, and feet hurt. But with these shoes I am pain free and balanced well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: like walking on clouds! but!! these shoes are cheaper on the HOKA website and they offer free shipping, love THE shoes
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive shoe but very expensive hrough Amazon. Next time I'll go through the Hoka website .
customer_reviews.author: Tina Packer

customer_reviews.title: Running shoe with the most cushion & support for problem feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hip problem that has given me nerve pain in my feet & this shoe enables me to walk for an hour daily without pain. Best running shoe I have ever had with the most cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lunde

customer_reviews.title: Hoka One One Women's Bondi 6 Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfectly. So supportive in all aspects and make walking feel so good and fun again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes and say they make all the difference in the world to her!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maximum cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Bought for running on the road so needed good cushioning to protect my joints. It is the most comfortable athletic shoe I have ever used! Felt like slippers and had no foot pain after a 5 mile run. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST running shoes esp for those with plantar fasciitis. Super comfortable, great fit, and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Run Large. The smaller size I wanted was not available.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable walking or running shoe, but not suitable for work.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Phew, I can make it through a shift now
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly from the get-go. Decreased foot, knee, hip discomfort after a busy shift hugely. Would buy again, no question.
customer_reviews.author: homesteadlite

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse on my feet all day at last I have found a shoe that is soooo comfortable, well made and worth every $! Loooove these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Himiff Diff Duff

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have RA and these are one of the few Shoes I can wear that dont hurt
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: The best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a shoe you don't even know you are wearing. It is so comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Good-quality walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe. Gives great support. Wouldn't buy any other brand but Hoka One One.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i like the great support on this shoe. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jandriarty

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my physical therapist suggested I try them to help with my knee pain. While my knee pain still exists I am now able to take my dogs on a 50-minute walk without pain. This was not possible before I got these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Barenholtz

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: love the shoes really helped with planta faciitis but just a little too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nurses
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh these shoes have made a huge difference in my foot. I am a CNA and on my feet for 12 hours and my feet do not hurt me any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Size runs slightly small.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Like bouncing on clouds even after 12 hrs in my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Harrell

product_meta.title: HOKA Bondi 6 Wide Woman Black
product_meta.description: You're in for a soft, comfortable ride with Hoka one one! The black Synthetic and textile upper comes together with a great style that is ready to hit the road. Made of an outsole in synthetic, sports have never been better.
